test.command: docker run -v $(JDK_HOME):/java --name hbase-test adoptopenjdk-hbase-test:latest; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-backup/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-client/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-common/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-endpoint/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-examples/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-hadoop-compat/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-hadoop2-compat/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-http/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-it/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-mapreduce/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-metrics-api/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-metrics/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-procedure/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-replication/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-rest/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-rsgroup/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-server/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-thrift/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker cp hbase-test:/hbase/hbase-zookeeper/target/surefire-reports $(REPORTDIR)/external_test_reports; \ docker rm hbase-test; \ $(TEST_STATUS)
